_header: My little pretty one my pretty bony one
_description: A jolly wanton — four 5-line stanzas with refrain, ‘nou doute she ys a loue of all that euer I see’

BLAdd4900.Transcription:
My lytell prety one my pretie boni oneshe is a iolie one & gentle
                    as can beewith a beck shee comse anon with a wincke she wilbe gonno
                    dowbte she is aloue of all that ever I see
